description:
- Behold the realm of Yomi... -
As Ren and company press onward to save Mana,
Akira and his group face a fierce battle against Yomi`s Army of Doom.
Just as things are looking bleak, out come Haruma and Lucy! Meanwhile,
when Ren`s group reaches the rooftop,
they see something completely unexpected...
[i]
Source: Youtube[/i]
